token_info.name: Dark landscape
token_info.description: Dark, imposing mountains are drawn on paper. Layers of moving light reveal reliefs and the intricate structure formed during geological times. The work consists of a physical drawing, and a layer of projected light. The mapping software is embedded in the NFT, and hosted on IPFS. Use mouse click to calibrate, and drag and drop the corners until the projection matches the physical print.  NFT + physical drawing + computer stick with NFT pre-installed. International shipping included. Video projector is not included and can be sourced locally.  This piece is available as an auction, offers can be made on Lemercierâ€™s collectors Discord: https://discord.gg/9qfTBpCG
